title: Frontend Developer
details: Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and ReduxToolkit. Developed and implemented numerous websites and applications. Utilized problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and resolve complex technical issues Excelled in communication and collaboration with team members

title: Customer Success Manager
details: Built and maintained strong customer relationships, driving customer satisfaction and retention. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and cross-sell additional products and services. Maintained accurate customer data and records

title: Marketing Assistant
details: Conducted market research and analyzed data to inform marketing strategies; Created and produced a variety of marketing materials; Assisted with sales and customer support initiatives

title: Help Desk
details: Provided technical support to customers and troubleshooted issues. Provided product info and managed customer relationships and installed/configured hardware/software for customers.
